title: Smart Herald Service
subtitle: Open your company to mobile communication

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text:
Smart Herald allows any company, partnership or association to broadcast messages on the phone, the tablet or the computer of their customers through an application that is dedicated to them.
Indeed, mobile applications are known for their efficiency, and are used by big companies. Offered as a service, you simply manage your messages and your costs, and you can get your own application.
